title: Nice app
comment: A bit unintuitive UI. And I lost half year of data, when I did a factory reset, and thought it was cloud synced 😢

title: Open Source!
comment: Works great for me, and I can (and did) modify it when needed. Jan is extremely  patient and helpful.

title: I have no complaints. Works great.
comment: I have been using it since you uploaded it to f-droid. Continue the great work. Love the new updates and calculations.
